```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dslabs)
```


1
glimpse(gapminder)

1.a

```{r}
gapminder%>%
  arrange(country)%>%
  select(country, year,gdp)%>%
  mutate(previous_year_gdp= lag(gdp, order_by = country))
```



1.b

```{r}
gapminder%>%
  arrange(continent)%>%
  select(continent, year,gdp)%>%
  mutate(previous_year_gdp= lag(gdp, order_by = continent))%>%
  group_by(continent, year) %>%
  summarise_at(vars(gdp, previous_year_gdp),sum,na.rm=TRUE)%>%
  mutate(change=gdp/previous_year_gdp-1)
```
